NeptuneData¶

class isopy.io.NeptuneData(information, cycle, time, isotope_data, ratio_data, other_data)[source]¶

Returned by read_exp().

If no line numbers are given in the exp file then the line number is set to 1.

info¶

The information stored in the exp file before the isotope data.

Type

dict

cycle¶

An array containing the cycle number of each row in the data.

Type

np.ndarray

isotope_data¶

A dict of IsotopeArray each containing the isotope data for the line given by the dict key.

Type

dict

ratio_data¶

A dict of RatioArray each containing the ratio data for the line given by the dict key.

Type

dict

other_data¶

A dict of dict each containing the remaining data for the line given by the dict key.

Type

dict
